eval_title: Study explores risk factors linked to chikungunya and dengue outbreaks | Illinois

rule_results.rule_summary: OBJECT for audio must have alternative
EMBED for audio must have alternative

rule_results.result_message: MC: Verify that there is no media content that plays automatically and includes audio content that lasts longer than 3 seconds.  If the audio content lasts longer than 3 seconds, verify the user can pause, stop or mute the audio.
MC: Verify that the first link on the page is a "skip to main content" link and that the target of the skip link is a focusable element.

V: Change the foreground and background colors of the 2 text elements to meet the CCR threshold.; H: The 319 elements with text content that are hidden were not analyzed for color contrast accessibility.
MC: Verify color is not used as the only visual means of conveying information, indicating an action, prompting a response, or distinguishing a visual element on the page.

rule_results.rule_summary: Image button must have alt. content
Radio buttons must have grouping label
SUBMIT and RESET buttons must be unique

rule_results.result_message: MC: Check the "tab" focus order of the page to make sure the sequence of focusable elements is meaningful.; H: The 39 links, form controls, embedded apps and/or widgets that are hidden do not need to be tested for focus order.

MC: Use the "tab" key to move focus between links, form controls, embedded apps and widgets and check the visibility of focus styling for each element as it receives focus.; H: The 179 links, form controls, embedded apps and/or widgets that are hidden do not need to be tested for focus order.

rule_results.rule_summary: Target focus must be in content window
rule_results.result_message: MC: Check the 147 links to make sure that if any of the links opens more than one window that the focus is in the content window.; H: The 39 link elements that are hidden do not need to be tested for content focus.
N/A; H: The IFRAME element that is hidden was not evaluated.

rule_results.rule_summary: H1 should be in MAIN or BANNER landmark

rule_results.result_message: W: Update the accessible names of the 2 sibling heading elements of the same level to be unique.

V: Review the entire heading structure and update the heading levels so that the 5 heading elements are properly nested in relation to the 57 headings on the page.; H: 3 heading elements that are hidden were not evaluated.
None; H: 3 heading elements that are hidden were not evaluated.
None; H: 10 image elements that are hidden were not evaluated.
MC: Verify that the text alternative of the IMG element or element with [ROLE="IMG"] accurately and succinctly summarizes the content and/or purpose of the image.

rule_results.rule_summary: Alt text must not include filename
Alt text no more than 100 characters

rule_results.result_message: MC: Verify the 43 images are being used purely for decorative, spacing or styling purposes.; H: 10 IMG elements and/or elements with [ROLE="IMG"] that are hidden were not evaluated.
MC: Determine if the IMG element or element with [ROLE="IMG"] can benefit from a long description, and if so, provide a detailed description of the content of the image.
MC: If the IMG element or element with [ROLE="IMG"] represents a mathematical expression, convert the image content to MathML.

rule_results.rule_summary: Interactive functionality must be keyboard operable
rule_results.result_message: MC: Verify that the functionality provided by the 4 links, form controls, elements with event handlers and/or embedded applications is operable through the keyboard.; H: 41 hidden links, form controls, elements with event handlers, OBJECT and/or APPLET elements were not evaluated.

rule_results.rule_summary: BANNER landmark: no more than one
CONTENTINFO landmark: no more than one
REGION landmark must have accessible name
rule_results.result_message: MC: Determine if any of the 3 elements with ARIA role of REGION should be landmarks, and if so, add an accessible name to the those elements.; H: 3 elements with ARIA role of REGION that are hidden were not evaluated.
W: Review the labeling of 5 landmarks to ensure that, if any other landmarks of the same type exist on the page, each has a unique accessible name.; H: 3 landmarks that are hidden were not evaluated.
MC: Verify that each of the 5 landmark roles correctly identifies the content region for which its corresponding element is a container.; H: 3 landmarks that are hidden were not evaluated.

rule_results.rule_summary: COMPLEMENTARY landmark: must be top level
rule_results.result_message: N/A; H: One element with [ROLE="COMPLEMENTARY"] attribute or ASIDE element that is hidden was not evaluated.

MC: Review the page for any text content that is different than the principal language of the page. If such content is found, use the LANG attribute on the appropriate container element to identify the language change.

rule_results.rule_summary: Layout tables must have meaningful sequence
Link text must describe the link target
rule_results.result_message: V: Add text content to the 43 empty links that describes the target of each link.; MC: Verify the accessible name of each of the 104 A, AREA or [ROLE=LINK] elements describes the target of the link.; H: 39 hidden links were not evaluated.
W: Change the accessible names or add ARIA-DESCRIBEDBY attributes to the 49 A, AREA or [ROLE=LINK] elements to provide additional information that makes each accessible name or description unique.
MC: Verify the 93 list elements are used semantically.; H: The 41 hidden list elements were not evaluated.
MC: Determine whether the 4 list container elements benefit from labels and, if so, verify that each accurately describes the contents of the list.; H: The 4 hidden list elements were not evaluated.

rule_results.rule_summary: At least two ways of finding content
rule_results.result_message: MC: Verify that this page can be found from other pages in the website using at least two of the following features: a website search feature; a list of links for navigation from at least one other page in the website and/or from a page in the web site that serves as a site map.
MC: Verify that this page uses the same ordering of MAIN, NAVIGATION, SEARCH, BANNER, CONTENTINFO, COMPLEMENTARY and any other shared landmarks as other pages within the website.

rule_results.rule_summary: Consistent ordering of H1 and H2 labels
rule_results.result_message: MC: Verify that this page uses the same ordering of H1 and H2 elements used to mark recurring page sections as the ordering used on the other pages within the website.

MC: Verify that the labeling of the MAIN, NAVIGATION, SEARCH, BANNER, COMPLEMENTARY and CONTENTINFO landmarks on this page is consistent with the labeling of all comparable landmarks on all other pages within the website.

rule_results.rule_summary: Consistent H1 and H2 page section labels
rule_results.result_message: MC: Verify that the accessible names of H1 and H2 elements used to identify recurring page sections are consistent with those on all other pages within the website.
MC: Verify the 378 elements positioned with CSS maintain a reading order meaningful to users of assistive technologies.; H: 47 elements positioned with CSS that are hidden were not evaluated.
MC: Resize the text using the zoom feature of the browser to check to make sure text content is visible (e.g. text is not clipped by iframe sizes or CSS overflow limits).

rule_results.rule_summary: OL and UL role grouping semantics
Do not override NAV element semantics.

rule_results.result_message: N/A; H: One ASIDE element that is hidden was not evaluated.

rule_results.rule_summary: Do not override HEADER element ROLE.
Do not override FOOTER element ROLE.
Not only shape, size and location
rule_results.result_message: MC: Verify that understanding the content, navigation of links and operation of controls and widgets does not depend solely on the shape, size, visual location, orientation, or sound.

rule_results.rule_summary: Data cells must have row/column headers
Data tables must have unique names
Identify table markup as data or layout
Header cells should be TH elements
Data cells must use HEADERS attribute
TITLE must identify website and page
rule_results.result_message: MC: Verify that the TITLE element identifies both the website (if applicable) and the page content.
MC: If the page contains time limits, verify that there is a way to turn off, adjust or extend the time limits; or that one of the three exceptions applies.

rule_results.rule_summary: Control moving, blinking or auto-updating content
rule_results.result_message: MC: If the page includes moving, blinking, scrolling or auto-updating content, verify there has a mechanism to pause, stop, or hide the information.; H: Message is missing for rule id: TIMING_2 and mesage id: HIDDEN_P

MC: Verify the page does not include content that flashes more than three times in one second, unless below general flash and red flash thresholds.; H: Message is missing for rule id: TIMING_3 and mesage id: HIDDEN_P

rule_results.rule_summary: VIDEO for video only must have alternative
OBJECT for video only must have alternative
EMBED for video only must have alternative
OBJECT for video must have captions
EMBED for video must have captions
VIDEO element must have audio description.
OBJECT for video must have audio description.
EMBED for video must have audio description

rule_results.result_message: None; H: 3 elements with a role that are hidden were not evaluated.
N/A; H: 3 widgets that are hidden were not evaluated.
N/A; H: 3 widgets that are hidden were not evaluated.

rule_results.rule_summary: Elements with event handlers must have roles
rule_results.result_message: MC: Verify the user interactions associated with the 3 interactive elements with one or more event handlers are accurately described by each element's widget role and/or their descendants.; H: The 5 interactive elements with event handlers were not evaluated.

rule_results.rule_summary: Verify appropriate use of live region
